sentence.Network_en: The added competition keeps them on their mettle.
The next game will be a real test of their mettle.
sentence.Network_cn: 下一场比赛就要看他们的拼搏精神了。

sentence.Network_en: When the seas are in turmoil , heroes are on their mettle.
sentence.Network_cn: 沧海横流,方显出英雄本色.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一尘 - blanket1983 - 网易博客 ... enthrall vt. 迷住，吸引住 mettle n. 才能；勇气 contest n. 竞赛，比赛.
英语单词词根词缀记忆大全_文档下载_文档资料库 ... （meddle 干涉） （mettle 精神，气质） （loath 恶心，讨厌）.
try a man ' s mettle ., 试探一个人的秉性.
气字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 气愤，气忿〖 indignant;furious〗 气概〖 loftyquality;mettle;spirit〗 气割〖 gascutting〗.

jx.jx_en_mean: be ready or forced to prove one's ability to cope well with a demanding situation
(of a demanding situation) test someone's ability to face difficulties
jx.jx_cn_mean: （严峻形势）使奋发，激励某人战胜困难

jx.jx_en_mean: Prepared to accept a challenge and do one's best.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 奋发：准备接受挑战并尽最大努力

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: specialized spelling (used for figurative senses) of metal

entry.def: Someone's mettle is their ability to do something well in difficult circumstances.

example.ex: His first important chance to show his mettle came when he opened the new session of the Legislature...
example.tran: 当他召开新一届立法会议的时候，让他展示才能的第一次重要机会来了。

example.ex: For both sides, it's the first real test of their mettle this season...
example.tran: 对于双方而言，这是本赛季对他们的能力的首次真正考验。

entry.tran: 鼓起勇气；全力以赴；振作精神
entry.def: If you are on your mettle, you are ready to do something as well as you can, because you know that you are being tested or challenged.

example.ex: The added competition keeps them on their mettle.

sentences.sentence: "you haven't got the heart for baseball"

auth_sentence.content: Time and again, he has proven his mettle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Time and again, he has proven his mettle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Time and again, he has proven his mettle.

auth_sentence.content: We think we know each other's mettle intimately.
auth_sentence.res_content: We think we know each other's mettle intimately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We think we know each other's mettle intimately.

auth_sentence.content: They had, at least, shown their mettle before qualifying.
auth_sentence.res_content: They had, at least, shown their mettle before qualifying.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They had, at least, shown their mettle before qualifying.

means.word_mean: 奋发起来；准备尽最大努力

sentences.en: When the boss comes round, I want you all to show your mettle.
sentences.cn: 老板来的时候，我希望你们每个人都表现出自己最好的状态。

sentences.en: He’ll have to be on his mettle if he wants to win the next race.
sentences.cn: 他如果想赢得下次比赛，就得全力以赴。

means.word_mean: 使某人尽最大努力；充分发掘某人的潜质

sentences.en: The school inspection is going to put the teachers on their mettle.
sentences.cn: 对学校的视察将使教师发挥出他们的全部潜力。
